about_the_game:
Will you be able to manage this bunch of lazy and good for nothing people?

Island Survival: Escape from Paradise is a casual and strategy 3D game where you will need to help a group of castaways escape from a tropical island. To do this, you must assign them tasks such as gathering water and food or building a boat. The problem is that each one will have their own skills and preferences, so they might refuse to do a task they don't like, or cause an accident trying to do something they're bad at.

It's your job to discover and remember the hobbies and skills of your castaways in order to assign them the most appropriate tasks.
